summary: Fetches all active public listings. Used in home feed and search results.
Fetches listings created by the logged-in user for dashboard management.
Fetches full listing details by ID, used on the property detail page.
Fetches AI resume builder usage logs for the logged-in user.
Fetches the latest AI agent match results for the user from Supabase.
Loads all saved JSON-LD SEO schemas created by the user.
Returns all AI tools currently enabled from the admin-controlled tool flags table.
Returns remaining and used credits for the current user for AI tool usage tracking.
Checks whether a specific AI tool is currently enabled for the user.
Returns full AI credit usage logs (admin-only panel for audit and tracking).
Returns total credits used across all users (admin summary panel).
Returns a leaderboard of developers by total AI tool usage (admin view).
Admin-only audit log for CRM lead interactions and system actions.
Updated search hook with flat types for manual and AI-powered property search.
